snippet: Since 2009, the number of schools offering gifted programs has fallen, especially in minority areas of the city like central Brooklyn, southeast Queens and the Bronx.
lead_paragraph: Since 2009, the number of schools offering gifted programs has fallen, especially in minority areas of the city like central Brooklyn, southeast Queens and the Bronx.

headline.seo: A Major Gap in Gifted Programs
headline.main: A Major Gap in Gifted Programs
